Invoke GIT BASH

1> echo $HOME

create a dummy

~/.bash_profile that loads ~/.bashrc will be created for you.


We have to further enhance it.

$ cat ~/.bashrc

# source project config
. /d/GoogleDrive/my_github/GitHub/gotolong/config.sh

$

$ cat ~/.bash_profile
# generated by Git for Windows
test -f ~/.profile && . ~/.profile
test -f ~/.bashrc && . ~/.bashrc

$

2>
